scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.git:feature: node -e "const branch = process.argv[1]; require('child_process').execSync('git checkout develop && git pull && git checkout -b feature/' + branch, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.git:deploy: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('git checkout main && git merge develop && git push origin main', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
